mdRecord.dcterms:title: King Albert I and Vice President Marshall at the Mansion, October 29, 1919
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: National Pictorial News
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Albert I, King of the Belgians, 1875-1934
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of King Albert I and Vice President Thomas R. Marshall standing along the west front of the Mansion just outside the central passage. A car and several individuals stand nearby. The photographer's stamp appears on the reverse. A handwritten caption (by Harrison Dodge) reads: ' King Albert & Vice President Marshall just entering main door of Mansion.'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
